newsitem.title: USA: PanEnergy to build Florida power plant.
newsitem.headline: PanEnergy to build Florida power plant.

text.p: HOUSTON, May 23 - PanEnergy Corp said on Friday that it has signed a letter of intent with the City of New Smyrna Beach, Fla. for the development of a 250-megawatt gas-fired combined cycle power generation plant.

"PanEnergy and the New Smyrna Beach Utilities Commission are working together to meet the increasing power requirements of Florida's citizens in the year 2000," Paula Rosput, president of PanEnergy Power Services, said in a statement.
